5.text:
Best case scenario, with chemo, I'll live
maybe another couple of years.

19.text:
Well that's, that's all of life, right? It's
just, it's the constant, it's the cycle.

26.text: It is growth, then decay, then transformation!

30.text: >>WALT: Hank, how much money is that?

38.text: It's easy money...till we catch ya.

42.text:
>>WALT: You lost your partner today. DEA took
all your money, your lab.

55.text:
But you know the business. And I know the
chemistry.

60.text:
>>JESSE: You uh...you want to cook crystal
meth?

64.text:
>>JESSE: Tell me why you're doing this. Some
straight like you, giant stick up his ass,

68.text:
all of a sudden at age what, 60 he's just
gonna break bad?

73.text:
>>JESSE: Jesus, you got crystals in here two
inches, three inches long.

78.text: This is pure glass. You're a god damn artist!

82.text: >>WALT: For what time I have left...

87.text:
...I want to live in my own house. I want
to sleep in my own bed.

93.text:
I don't want to choke down thirty or forty
pills every single day and lose my hair,

99.text: and lie around, too tired to get up.

103.text:
Some uh...some dead man, some artificially
alive...just marking time?

117.text:
>>TUCO: Two pounds, next week, and no production
problems.

124.text: >>WALT: We're not going to need pseudoephedrine.

127.text:
We're going to make phenylacetone in a tube
furnace, then we're going to use reductive

142.text:
>>WALT: Seven-hundred thirty-seven thousand
dollars, that's what I need. That is what

152.text:
>>WALT: You're an insane, degenerate piece
of filth, and you deserve to die.

160.text: >>HANK: We keep hearing a name, uh, Heisenberg.

166.text: >>WALT: I have spent my whole life scared.

171.text: Ever since my diagnosis...I sleep just fine

177.text: >>SAUL: You two suck at peddling meth.

181.text: What you two need is an honest-to-god businessman.

183.text:
You know, from what I do hear about him, he
sounds a little like you.

186.text:
>>GUS: I don't think we're alike at all Mr.
White.

189.text:
>>JANE: All Jesse wants is what's coming to
him.

191.text:
>>WALT: For your information I am holding
Jesse's money for him,

192.text:
and he will receive every last dollar of it
at a time when I see fit.

198.text: But I will not contribute to his overdose.

204.text: >>HANK: I say Heisenberg's still out there.

210.text:
>>GUS: Three million dollars. For three months
of your time.

212.text:
>>WALT: I have more money than I know how
to spend.

214.text: What I don't have is my family.

219.text:
>>WALT: I have made a series of...very bad
decisions.

226.text: >>GUS: Why did you make these decisions?

233.text: >>WALT: For the good of my family.

237.text:
>>MIKE: You got a good thing going here, we
all do.

239.text: You want to risk it all on one junkie?

241.text: >>WALT: You don't have to do this!

244.text: >>WALT: Your boss is gonna need me.

253.text:
>>WALT: What did you expect me to do, just
simply roll over and allow you to murder us?

278.text:
>>WALT: I am not in danger Skyler, I am the
danger!

282.text: I am the one who knocks!

283.text:
>>WALT: If you could kill me...I'd already
be dead.

290.text:
...because Jesse wouldn't cook for you if
you did.

296.text:
>>GUS: In the meantime there's the matter
of your brother-in-law.

300.text: He is a problem. If you try to interfere,

303.text: I will kill your wife. I will kill your son.

305.text: I will kill your infant daughter.

315.text:
>>WALT: Why...in god's name would I poison
a child?

320.text:
Jesse, who do you know, who's allowed children
to be murdered, hm? Gus!

324.text:
And now, the one thing that he needed to finally
get rid of me is your consent,

325.text: and boy he's got that now!

329.text:
>>WALT: I am offering you an opportunity for
revenge.

350.text: >>MIKE: You are a time bomb, tick tick ticking.

353.text:
And I have no intention of being around for
the boom.

377.text:
>>MIKE: All of this, falling apart like this
is on you!

390.text:
You and your pride and your ego! You just
had to be the man!

406.text:
>>JESSE: Ever since I met you, everything
I have ever cared about...is gone...

410.text: ...ever since I hooked up with the great Heisenberg!

423.text: >>WALT: My name is Walter Hartwell White.

424.text:
To all law enforcement agencies, this is not
an admission of guilt. I am speaking to my

430.text:
Skyler...you are the love of my life...I hope
you know that.

441.text: There are...there are going to be some...things...

446.text:
...things that you'll come to learn about
me in the next few days.

453.text:
I just want you to know that no...no matter
how it may look...

460.text: ...I only had you in my heart...
